body:
I don't know where the fuck to post this so I am posting it here


How to play!

You just give basic things on what has changed about you or what you have improved on from the last year or 2.


Rules

1. Don't write stupid posts that have no meaning (As you can see it ticks me off)
2. Be respectful to others!

Mine are....

I was so bad at grammar last year. If you check my posts on like my 40th page you could see I sucked. I am not saying I am pro at grammar now but I have improved :D

replies.body:
Love how you tried to include some nice fancy vocab in there :P


I have improved my team management skills, i feel like i am quite good at understanding people and their personalities and motives which i definetly was not good at last year. I have improved my organisation and probably the largest one being my body has greatly improved. I'm a gym lad now.

Minecraft wise, i have gotten so much better tactically and at leading my team, i have developed my cannoning to a good standard, of course i have also improved my pvp, a lot. All in all i was a complete and utter dick last year so i feel i have improved a lot.

replies.body:
I've only started seriously pvping a bit under a year ago, despite playing Minecraft since about 2010. I've come a long way since then, but things I am most proud of include
  • I am now quite good at getting people into combos, an underrated skill that is very, very useful.
  • I can click quite fast, maintaining a steady 11-13 clicks per second while pvping.
  • My bridging still sucks, but when I started I was absolutely terrible.
replies.body_tagged:
